comment: Abel's theorem. If the power series ` sum_ n e. NN0 A ( n ) ( x ^ n ) ` is convergent at ` 1 ` , then it is equal to the limit from "below", along a Stolz angle ` S ` (note that the ` M = 1 ` case of a Stolz angle is the real line ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` ). (Continuity on ` S \ { 1 } ` follows more generally from ~ psercn .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
